snippet: The American sprinter Tyson Gay said he would return from his one-year ban for doping on July 3 at a meet in Lausanne, Switzerland.
abstract: American sprinter Tyson Gay will return from his one-year doping ban at July meet in Lausanne, Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: The American sprinter Tyson Gay said he would return from his one-year ban for doping on July 3 at a meet in Lausanne, Switzerland.

headline.main: Gay to Return From Doping Ban
headline.print_headline: Gay to Return From Doping Ban
